name: SIMAApplicationInput
description: Entities from this blueprint are used as input to a container (as json string) when running SIMA jobs

attributes.name: input
attributes.description: An input entity as json string (must be of same type as defined by inputType)

attributes.name: inputPresetFolder
attributes.description: Path to a folder inputs can be selected from

attributes.name: resultPath
attributes.description: Where results from a job should be uploaded. Must be a valid folder location in DMSS. If this value is not provided, no results will be uploaded to DMSS.

attributes.name: simaInputFilePath
attributes.description: A parameter used by the init script to decide where it should create the input file that SIMA will read. Can be absolute ('/someFolder/myFile.json'), or relative ('./myFile.json') to the sima workspace.

attributes.name: simaOutputFilePath
attributes.description: A parameter used by the upload script to know which output-/result file the SIMA job created, and should be upload. Can be absolute ('/someFolder/myFile.json'), or relative ('./myFile.json') to the sima workspace.
